item.title: Add-on Developer Guide
item.description: This page is a developer guide about how to build an OCM add-on using addon-framework. Overview Write your first add-on Implement the addon manager Deploy the add-on manager on your hub cluster RBAC of the addon manager ClusterManagementAddOn Enable the add-on for a managed cluster. Disable the add-on for a managed cluster Whatâ€™s the next Add-on agent configurations Monitor addon healthiness Automatic installation Register your add-on Build an addon using helm charts or raw manifests.
